amendment.description: Amendment provides $7.5 million to the Community Oriented Policing Services (COPS) program in order to expand community prosecution programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the appropriation for innovative policing programs under the COPS program by $7,500,000, from $140,000,000 to $147,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blagojevich amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
